ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargePistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge pistol
ThingDef.description: Light amplified by the stimulated emission of radiation in two-shot pistol form!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge smg
ThingDef.description: This SMG is highly damaging, accurate and deadly in the right hands, even if it trades a short charge time for a longer reload time.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeCarbine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge carbine
ThingDef.description: A short ranged version of the standard charge rifle. Its KAR-BINE not CAH-BINE.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge shotgun
ThingDef.description: The ancient design required laser amplification to improve it. Your enemies become slightly more spread out with each use.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge lmg
ThingDef.description: An uncommon bullpup "laser machine gun". The designer didnt like the additional C.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeDMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge dmr
ThingDef.description: Designated Marksman Rifle. Like an ancient survival rifle but its chargy this time!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeSniper_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: High damage and light weight makes for a brutal combination. Technically bolt action. Prefered gun of any respectable contract killer.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_ChargeMinigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge minigun
ThingDef.description: A laser minigun with an ludicrously high magazine capacity but a high charge time. Popular with bounty hunters. The main downside is identifing the bodies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_PotatoLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona potato launcher
ThingDef.description: The designers of this weapon thought it would be funny to go for something off the hook. What they made was exactly that... and then some. Coleslaw not included.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_FlechetteShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona flechette shotgun
ThingDef.description: Similar design to the Pump shotgun, only it uses heavy "flechettes", which are practically darts. Perfect for pub games on your enemies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_FlameThrower_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona flame thrower
ThingDef.description: One deranged colonist from that possibly friendly midworld colony expanded on the "hairspray and lighter" concept a while ago. Pyromaniacs praise said colonist as their deity.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_Coilgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona coilgun
ThingDef.description: Coilguns use high powered electromagnets to launch a obliterating projectile over an incredibly long distance. Of course, the capacitor charges incredibly slowly to increase its incredibility.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_HyperborealRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona hyperboreal rifle
ThingDef.description: Pyromaniacs tend to fear this quantum ice cream maker, ironically due it being their version of hell.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_TaserPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona taser pistol
ThingDef.description: Taking high voltage to your body is an acquired tased\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_TaserRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona taser rifle
ThingDef.description: This rifle has an absolutely stunning display to show your friends!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
